Description: 
------------ 
F1 2011 is the continuation of the video game F1 2010 BAFTA Award winner, created by Codemasters. F1 has the exclusive worldwide license for Formula One World Championship Limited and includes the drivers, teams and tracks official Formula One World Championship 2011 

Go Compete! 
Generously wide F1 2011 F1 2010 multiplayer options. Included for the first time the split screen. Competitive play is extended to 16 players racing head to head in the Grand Prix with up to 8 pilots to complete the grills IA 24. Absolute novelty, two players can also work together to bring their favorite team to the top of the podium drivers' and constructors. To this must be added as well as fast modes Time Attack. 
New circuits, 2011: Two interesting additions are added to the F1 race calendar 2011 to add 19 circuits. Players can test before the real pilots Buddh International Circuit, home of the first Grand Prix Formula 1 in India and may take their skills to the limit for the first time in high definition on the iconic Nrburging circuit, as this legendary track returns for the 2011 season. 
Become a pilot, lives the life of a pilot 
From the paddock to the track, F1 2011 on the Formula 1 experience to the player like never before. Parc Ferme a new area, an expanded and renovated Paddock as the Pit Lane, new animations such as the celebration of the triumph and a system of improved media interaction will immerse players in glamor, pressure and excitement of being a Formula One driver Players progress from novice level to be world champion in a long career where they struggle to remain in good standing, earn points and thus become the main driver of the team and influence the development of the car. 
All cars and star drivers 
Fully licensed, F1 2011 includes all the drivers competing in the 2011 World Championship Formula One FIA ??as Sebastian Vettel, Fernando Alonso, Lewis Hamilton and Jenson Button among others. All computers in 2011 are represented (Ferrari, Red Bull Racing, Vodafone, McLaren Mercedes and Lotus Renault GP with their famous black and gold colors) 
KERS, DRS and more!: F1 2011 incorporates the changes in the regulations that are intended to make this the most exciting season to date. F1 opens the DRS 2011 system (drag reduction), the new system by which pilots can adjust the rear wing downforce and reducing speeding. In addition KERS again giving players extra 80 bhp for a maximum of 6.67 seconds, allowing them an extra boost to overtake the rival. Combined, these new options for both defensive and offensive, promote the excitement and rivalry in the race. On the other hand the new Pirelli tires this season are recreated in the game with full fidelity and if players are forced his car too will see defects and damage that had never before experienced. 
Transition Day / Night 
The Grand Prix Formula 1 Etihad Airways Abu Dhabi this year is the transition day / night that gives you that special atmosphere at this unique circuit. Each and every one of the circuits that remain of the 2010 season just passed a comprehensive review in which they have gained new weather effects such as cloud dynamics, and an advanced climate system model of rain that decisively affects the adhesion of the track. 
The world's most powerful cars, the most exciting races 
F1 2011 is suitable for all skill levels, from casual players to experienced through all the intermediate levels. Simply adjust any of the wide range of variables to make the game like a glove fits the style of each player. You can also leave the settings in the hands of crew chief and go directly to running. 
The sum of Formula One and EGO 
F1 2011 is developed through the EGO Game Technology Platform, a development of the EGO engine-winning original. EGO allows the sharing of tools and technology between research and core technology team, making the creative vision of designers to come true on multiple platforms, always accompanied by stunning graphics, a revolutionary AI, an advanced physics engine and integrated network game.
